attributes.action: stop ALL expenses paid to MPs immediately
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It’s obvious that anybody who has worked with or had expense accounts that sooner or later they will be abused by somebody. With the MP expenses not only has there been fraudulent claims but also ridiculous claims 'within the rules', this is unacceptable with public money and whatever rules put in place loopholes will be found and some MPs will always try to exploit them. Let simply save tax payers money immediately by banning ALL MP expenses forthwith.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
